title: Birdbrain Personalization Engine
summary: AI personalization at massive scale: 1.25 billion daily exercises training the Goldilocks algorithm for 31M+ users

content.whatItIs: Duolingo's Birdbrain system represents AI personalization at massive scale: it updates every day based on 1.25 billion exercises that learners complete, making predictions about what 31+ million monthly active users know and need to learn next.
howItWorks: Birdbrain system developed ~2018, updates daily based on 1.25 billion exercises completed
The Goldilocks principle: find perfect difficulty for each user—too hard is frustrating, too easy is boring
AI continuously calibrates this balance for every learner individually
In 2023, added GPT-4 as 'language reasoning core' for premium features
GPT-4 powers 'Explain My Answer' (contextual explanations) and 'Roleplay' (dynamic dialogue)
content.coreInsight: Build AI systems that learn from every user interaction at massive scale. Use this data to achieve 'Goldilocks personalization'—not one-size-fits-all, but individually calibrated difficulty. Layer in LLMs for reasoning on top of proprietary behavioral models.
content.keyMetrics: CEO Luis von Ahn's vision: 'We will become as good as a one-on-one language tutor.' Results: 51% surge in DAU, $1B revenue milestone, $9B+ market cap.
